reflects your needs.

card2.title: Matching
card2.text1: Match developers in n days on average

review1.text: I was worried about the high cost of outsourcing development, but I was able to solve it through satisfactory planning and continuous feedback at a reasonable estimate.

review2.text: Working with Berkeley Consulting's development/design team, it was smooth sailing as we were able to get our ongoing additions and change requests done in a timely manner.

review3.text: They shared accurate estimates and schedules, so I felt confident in their maintenance.

review4.text: During the project with VERCON, I was most satisfied with the consultation and feedback on the estimate and development schedule.

review5.text: In addition to the global development team, there was a large pool of partners, and we were able to save a lot of money overall because we were working in English from the beginning.

review6.text: I was worried that it would be difficult to communicate with the outsourced developer due to my lack of development knowledge, but the communication was seamless and the launch was flawless.

faq.mainTitle: Have any questions? Get in Touch
faq.title: Frequently asked questions

faq1.question: 1. I'd like an estimate of the cost.
faq1.answer: Yes, you can try us for free for 30 days. If you want, we’ll provide you with a free, personalized 30-minute onboarding call to get you up and running as soon as possible.

faq2.question: 2. How does the contract process work?
